name: A Walk With My Nokia 3310
description:
You have found yourself on your daily walk around town. You have brought your brand new Nokia 3310. Maybe you should play game?

Oh, there is only one game? 

Yeah, but it's pretty difficult! Hope you don't get too mad at it!

How To Play:

W-A-S-D to Move your thumb.

LMB or Space to Push a key.

2-4-6-8 to Move the cube in the game.

Full Screen heavily recommended!
